# Swiss Price
```{r}
time_cut <- as.POSIXct("2023-01-01 00:00:00", tz = "UTC")
df <- read_csv("../../00 Data Retrieval and Cleaning/0_df_predictive_dech_auction_price.csv") %>% 
  filter(date >= time_cut)
dummies_columns <- df %>%
  select(contains(c("_dummy", "cal_"))) %>% 
  colnames()

factor_colums <- c('dst', dummies_columns)

df <- df %>%                              #needed for recovering interaction easily
  mutate_at(vars(factor_colums), factor)

x <- df %>%
  select(contains(c('cal_', 'dst')))

formula_str <- "~  .^2"                 #all possible intereactions
formula_str <- formula(formula_str)

x <- model.matrix(formula_str, data = x) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  select(-contains("Intercept")) %>% 
  mutate_all(., as.factor)


df <- df %>% 
  select(-contains(c('cal_', 'dst'))) %>% 
  bind_cols(., x)

df %>% dim()
rm(x)


discontinue_variables <- df %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  select(-contains(c('cal_', 'dst'))) %>% 
  slice(1700:1900) %>%
  select(-c(allocated_capacity_ch_de, allocated_capacity_de_ch)) %>% 
  select(-contains('forecast')) %>% #easy for computation to subset
  detect_columns_with_consecutive(n_consecutive = 13) %>%
  names()

discontinue_variables

df <- df %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(discontinue_variables), ~ interpolation_vector(.))) #they will be the same for 

#Remove zero variance
df <- df %>%  
  mutate(across(-date, as.numeric))

variances = df %>%  
  select(-c(date)) %>%  
  apply(2, var)

null_variance_cols <- names(variances[variances == 0])
df <- df %>% 
  select(-all_of(null_variance_cols))


df %>% dim()

n <- df  %>% 
  nrow()

x <- df  %>% 
  filter(date >= as.POSIXct("2024-01-01 00:00:00", tz = "UTC")) %>% 
  nrow()

p.train <- 1-(x/n)
max_lag =24*5   # 1 month - this is the amount of data that we will lose by shifting


rm(x, n)

dummies_columns <- c( 'dst', 'cal', 'dummy', 'date')

ff <- formula(auction_price_de_ch ~ -1 + .^2) #only numeric
X1 <- df %>% 
  select(-contains(dummies_columns)) %>% 
  model.matrix(ff, data = .)


X2 <- df %>%
  select(-c(auction_price_de_ch, date)) %>% 
  select(-contains(dummies_columns)) %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), ~ .^2, .names = "{.col}_squared")) %>% 
  select(contains('_squared'))

df <- df %>% 
  select(c(auction_price_de_ch, date)) %>% 
  bind_cols(., X1) %>% 
  bind_cols(., X2)
df %>% dim()

rm(X1, X2)
```


```{r, cache=TRUE}
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date))+
  geom_line(aes(y = auction_price_ch_de))+
  labs(title = 'Price original', x = 'Date', y = 'Price')

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date))+
  geom_line(aes(y = ihs10(auction_price_ch_de)))+
  labs(title = 'Price ihs10', x = 'Date', y = 'Price')

df %>% 
  mutate(auction_price_ch_de = log(auction_price_ch_de - min(auction_price_ch_de) +1)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date))+
  geom_line(aes(y = auction_price_ch_de))+
  labs(title = 'Price log', x = 'Date', y = 'Price')

df %>% 
  mutate(auction_price_ch_de = u.log(auction_price_ch_de)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date))+
  geom_line(aes(y = auction_price_ch_de))+
  labs(title = 'Price u.log', x = 'Date', y = 'Price')

df %>% 
  mutate(auction_price_ch_de = asinh(auction_price_ch_de)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date))+
  geom_line(aes(y = auction_price_ch_de))+
  labs(title = 'Price tanh', x = 'Date', y = 'Price')
```

```{r}
models <- df %>% 
  mutate(auction_price_de_ch = ihs10(auction_price_de_ch)) %>% 
  model_list(p.train = p.train, n_lags_max = max_lag, response = 'auction_price_de_ch')
```

```{r}
best_models <- model_selected(models, response = 'Transmission price DE-CH')
```

```{r}
results <- prediction_step(models, auction = T, inverse_transformation = inverse_ihs10, response = 'Transmission price DE-CH')
```

```{r}
results$result %>% 
  mutate(.pred = fc_sra) %>% 
  mutate(actual = price) %>% 
  select(c(date, .pred, actual)) %>% 
  write.csv(file = 'holdout_predictions1.csv')
```
